DeathSteel::

He rubs his jaw and smiles. He gets into a defensive stance with his 
battle blade over his head. He stands there, motionless.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He brings one of his blades around in a parry this time, 
forcing the 
> slash low.  He hops up to the side and lashes out with his foot 
while 
> spinning over the incoming slash.  He comes down to land on his 
free foot and 
> hops back away from his opponent.  "One more try."
